verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H2142"\w* end, \w for|strong="H1732"\w* Idithun himself, \w a|strong="H1732"\w* canticle \w of|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* said: \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H3256"\w* heed \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* ways: \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* sin \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* tongue. \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* set guard \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* mouth, \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sinner stood against \w me|strong="H3256"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* dumb, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* humbled, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* kept silence \w from|strong="H5921"\w* good things: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* renewed.

\w My|strong="H6440"\w* heart grew hot \w within|strong="H1320"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* meditation \w a|strong="H0369"\w* fire \w shall|strong="H1320"\w* flame \w out|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* spoke \w with|strong="H3513"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* tongue: O Lord, \w make|strong="H3513"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* know \w my|strong="H3588"\w* end. \w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w what|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H5771"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w number|strong="H3515"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* days: \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H4480"\w* know \w what|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H5771"\w* wanting \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.

Behold thou hast \w made|strong="H0887"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* days measurable: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* substance \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* nothing \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee. \w And|strong="H6440"\w* indeed all things \w are|strong="H6440"\w* vanity: every man living.

\w Surely|strong="H1980"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* passeth \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w an|strong="H5704"\w* image: yea, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* disquieted \w in|strong="H1980"\w* vain. \w He|strong="H5704"\w* storeth \w up|strong="H5704"\w*: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* knoweth not \w for|strong="H3117"\w* whom \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* gather \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1320"\w* \w now|strong="H3588"\w* \w what|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* hope? \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord? \w and|strong="H1320"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* substance \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* thee.

Deliver thou \w me|strong="H3820"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H5704"\w* iniquities: thou hast made \w me|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H5704"\w* reproach \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* fool.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H3605"\w* dumb, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* opened \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* mouth, \w because|strong="H4480"\w* thou hast \w done|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w*.

Remove thy scourges \w from|strong="H3820"\w* \w me|strong="H5869"\w*. \w The|strong="H1571"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* thy hand hath \w made|strong="H1571"\w* \w me|strong="H5869"\w* faint \w in|strong="H1571"\w* rebukes:

Thou hast corrected man \w for|strong="H5061"\w* iniquity. \w And|strong="H5975"\w* thou hast made \w his|strong="H5048"\w* soul \w to|strong="H7138"\w* waste \w away|strong="H5048"\w* \w like|strong="H0157"\w* \w a|strong="H5975"\w* spider: surely \w in|strong="H5975"\w* vain \w is|strong="H5975"\w* any man disquieted.

Hear \w my|strong="H3605"\w* prayer, \w O|strong="H5315"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* supplication: \w give|strong="H1696"\w* ear \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* tears. \w Be|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* silent: \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* am \w a|strong="H1696"\w* stranger \w with|strong="H1696"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* sojourner \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* fathers \w were|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w O|strong="H8085"\w* forgive \w me|strong="H0589"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* refreshed, \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* go hence, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w*.
